item.name: Kara Kara Vineyard
item.winemaker: Steven Zsigmond Jr, Steve Zsigmond, Hanging Rock Winery
item.description: Hungarian-born Steve Zsigmond comes from a long line of vignerons and sees Kara Kara as the eventual retirement occupation for himself and wife Marlene. He is a graduate of the Adelaide University (Roseworthy) wine marketing course, and worked for Yalumba and Negociants as a sales manager in Adelaide and Perth. He looks after sales and marketing from the Melbourne premises of Kara Kara, and the wine is made at Hanging Rock by Steve Zsigmond Jr, his father in semi-retirement, with consistent results.
